    DatabaseMT.searchCentersByName(String str)
    Returns in alphabetical order an array of centers which have a name that contains the input string For example, if the given string is "var" then the output would be an array like this: { "Centro di Varese", "Centro di Novarese", "Centro di Isola Dovarese", ...
